PaymentLinkEvent.name: PaymentLinkEvent
PaymentLinkEvent.description: Represents a payment link platform event. Subscribe to these events so you can listen and respond to them when theyâ€™re published. For example, create a Salesforce Flow that is triggered when one of these events is published.

ChangeType.description: Type of payment link event, which triggers and event notification.

PaymentLinkId.description: Type of payment link event. You can write code to operate conditionally on the value of this field. For example, you can ignore a create change but get notified of updates.
